data.text:
Get Stop Motion Studio, the worldâs easiest app to get you into stop motion moviemaking today!

Want to create movies like Wallace and Gromit or those groovy Lego shorts on YouTube? With its user-friendly interface and powerful editing tools, you can bring your imagination to life and share your creations with the world. Perfect for both beginners and professionals, the Stop Motion Studio app is the ultimate tool for creating captivating animations. Download it now and start animating today!

******************************************

As seen on Apple's TV commercial âLife on iPad.â

"Stop-motion animation is a great way to bring toys and other objects to life â and learn the basics of filmmaking."

The New York Times

"Stop Motion Studio makes it easy to create your own stop-motion movies."

The Washington Post

"All you need is an iPhone or iPad, a tripod, the right software, and a bit of creativity."

PCMag

"Stop Motion Studio Brings Out the LEGO Moviemaking Geek in All of Us."

Technewsworld

******************************************

No ads, user tracking or subscriptions. All data is stored solely on the device.

It's simple to use, deceptively powerful and insanely fun to play with. Letâs make a movie.

Stop Motion Studio is a powerful, full-featured movie editor with a whole host of features:

â¢ A simplistic, easy-to-use interface

â¢ Overlay mode showing the differences between frames

â¢ Animation guides to position animated objects more easily

â¢ Copy, paste, cut, and insert frames at any position

â¢ Interactive timeline so you never get lost, even if you have hundreds of frames

Create beautiful movies:

â¢ Choose from a whole lot of unique titles, credits, and text cards or create your very own with the built-in editor

â¢ Give your movie the perfect look with different video filters

â¢ Enhance your movie with different foregrounds, backgrounds, aspect ratios, and fade effects

â¢ Create a soundtrack using built-in music, sound effects, songs from your music library, or your narration

â¢ Rotoscoping: Import video clips and create stunning animations by drawing over it.

â¢ Green Screen: Change the background of your scene to make the figures you capture fly or appear anywhere you can imagine.

â¢ Connect a keyboard and use simple shortcuts to edit movies quickly

Capture like a pro:

â¢ Capture with an adjustable time interval feature

â¢ Full camera control with automatic or manual white balance, focus and exposure, ISO and shutter speed

â¢ Use a second device as a remote camera

â¢ Use your Apple Watch as a remote shutter release

Powerful, built-in layer-based image editor:

â¢ Add text and speech bubbles or create titles

â¢ Add facial expressions to LEGOÂ® figures

â¢ Touch up and enhance images, sketch, and paint

â¢ Wipe away unwanted objects with the eraser tool

â¢ Merge frames to simulate fast movement

Share with friends and family:

â¢ Save to your photo library or share to YouTube in 4K or 1080p

â¢ Save as iMessage sticker or animated GIF

â¢ Save all images for further processing

â¢ Easily transfer projects between devices using AirDrop, Dropbox or iCloud

â¢ Start creating on your mobile device and continue right where you left off on your Mac

Learn to animate:

â¢ Watch the included tutorial videos

â¢ Read the comprehensive manual

â¢ Use the animation tips and tricks provided

* Some features require in-app purchases. All features are already included in the Pro version.

HailUmbridge ,

Great app, but I am unable to find a solution.

I want to start off by saying that this app is amazing and I use it as an alternative to many of the other stop motion editing softwares as it is much easier. I have used this app for about 8 months and have spent countless hours animating. I have bought all of the add ons to get the full experience and make my stop motions as best as I can. That said recently I have encountered a problem that is not only irritating but unnecessarily difficult. Recently the merge option has been greyed out, although his might not seem like such a big problem it is really irritating. I am currently working on an ant man and the wasp LEGO trailer stop motion, and a character known as the ghost has powers that require a merge of different slides, the shrinking and growing effects also require the same method but I canât for the life of me figure out how to fix this. I have attempted to contact the developers through the website, but I got an error display and couldnât move further. If this is only a simple bug that can be fixed or a patch that has been ridiculously over complicated than I need to know. I have spent about an hour researching if others have encountered the same problem or are having trouble but I canât find anything, if anyone has any solutions or the developers themselves see this then please help. This is something that I know has worked in the past so there is no reason it shouldnât now.

Max Stop Motion ,

I absolutely love this app but it has a few problems

Ok so I have finally found an app that lets me create animations without too much trouble. Itâs very intuitive and has many great features. But as every other app it has itâs problems. One of the ones Iâve had the most issues with is that when I have it set to manual it will still auto correct brightness whenever I put my hand in front of the camera, not sure if itâs my phoneâs fault or the appâs but it is a problem because it creates a lot of light flicker. Another is that whenever I have it zoomed in and I go to look at the pictures I have already taken it resets the zoom. This makes it very difficult to animate dialogue.

I have a few more nitpickey complaints. Mostly just that I canât set the ISO to anything below 100 (I know that expensive cameras donât go below it either.) I often find that my sets are way to bright. And one final complaint, there isnât a slider for white balance. I just feel restricted because it has a set of presets. I also have a suggestion: a feather option for erasing/painting would be awesome. It would create smoother transitions from the previous frame to the next. And also if there is a way please allow us to change the aperture as well.

Overall this is by far my favorite stop motion app and I only want to see it improve. Hope you found this useful.
